events.message: Customer reported a car accident that occurred on February 28th, involving a collision with another vehicle at an intersection.
Claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on the description involving vehicle collision and damages.
An agent with expertise in auto claims was assigned to handle the case promptly to ensure customer support.
Customer was contacted to acknowledge receipt of the claim and informed about the next steps in the process.
Request sent to customer for submitting police report, photos of vehicle damage, and repair estimates.
Customer provided all requested documents including a detailed accident report and repair cost evaluations.
Investigation has begun to verify the facts of the collision and assess the extent of the damages reported.
Investigation concluded confirming the liability and the legitimacy of damages from the vehicle collision.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer based on repair cost estimates and policy coverage.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and the clarity of communication throughout the process.
The claim was formally approved by the claims manager without any further adjustments or conditions.
Payment for the approved settlement was issued and sent to the customer's designated bank account.
The claim has been officially closed as all processes were completed to the satisfaction of the customer.
